title: Secretary-General's High-level Panel on Digital Cooperation | Secretary-General | United Nations

quotes: The Panel will hold its first in-person meeting in late September 2018 and is expected to submit its final report to the Secretary-General within 9 months.
The Panel will hold its first in-person meeting in late September 2018 and is expected to submit its final report to the Secretary-General within 9 months.
It will be supported by a small Secretariat funded by donor resources, and based in New York and Geneva. starting in September.
